'''''Minecraft: Battle & Tumble (Original Soundtrack)''''' is the second soundtrack released for ''Minecraft'' by [[Gareth Coker]], which features music from the [[Battle (mini game)|Battle]] and [[Tumble]] mini games. Originally released as part of the June 21, 2016, and August 30, 2016 updates to Legacy Console Edition, the soundtrack was later released on December 21, 2016.

== Trivia ==
* The tracks ''Dance of the Blocks'' and ''Toys on a Tear'' have been rearranged as part of the Minecraft crossover for ''[[Super Smash Bros. Ultimate]]''. Additionally, the track ''Clockwork Crafter'' was integrated into the game, ripped directly from [[Legacy Console Edition]].
